attributes.additional_details: The recent referendum had a strong anti-imigration element to it and as such, additional assurances should be given to the EEA citizens currently living in the UK that they are a welcome and valuable part of UK society as well as providing assurances that they can continue their life here and have a clear path to remain should they so desire.
attributes.background: The government should a) make it clear that discrimation or racist behavoiur will not be tolerated towards EEA citizens and b) grandfather the path towards indefinite leave to remain/citizenship for any EEA Citizen who are in the UK prior to article 50 being invoked.
